name: Dr. Tomato's Potato Tornado
description:
Dr. Tomato has gotten herself in a rather potatoey situation. Will she be able to make it to the big science competition on time?

WASD to move. Collide with potatoes that are smaller then you to turn them into fries which you can absorb. Each fry you collect gives you 1 point, and touching a potato that's too big subtracts 10 points.

Made by Clarke Haight for ScoreSpace Jam 20 with the theme of "Absorb".
